data.title: Water temperature in Bachelino in the Tobol River now
data.meta_description: What is the current water temperature in Bachelino in the Tobol River? How the water temperature will change in Bachelino in the coming days. Statistics for recent years.
data.text:
Russia > Tyumen region

Bachelino

Water temperature in the Tobol River today

Bachelino, Russia | © tumentoday.ru

The most detailed information about the water temperature in Bachelino in the Tobol River (Tyumen region, Russia). Forecast of changes in water temperature for the next 10 days. Statistics by months for recent years. Information about the neighboring resorts. Weather forecast in Bachelino for a week.

Water temperature in Bachelino right now

data updated 4 minutes ago

14.7°C

yesterday: 14.9°C

a week ago: 18.6°C

Trend: slow drop

Today water temperature in Bachelino is 14.7°C. Water of this temperature is considered cold enough. Dipping or immersion in such water is possible only for a short time. Staying in such water for more than two hours can lead to loss of consciousness. In any case, the general weather is also important. So, the air temperature at the same time will reach 14°C.

Analysis and forecast

The water temperature today is significantly lower than the average on this day in recent years. Its value has rise over the last week, but has drop compared to 20 days ago. Exactly a year ago, on this day, the water temperature in this location was 19°C. Water temperature range in Bachelino in August is from 11 to 24 degrees.

According to our forecast, in the coming days, the water temperature value in Bachelino will slightly drop and in 10 days it will be 13.0°C.

* Fact - Actual value of water temperature

** Average - Average water temperature on this day in past years

*** Forecast - Our forecast for the water temperature

Actual nearshore temperatures may vary by several degrees from the indicated values. This is noticeable after heavy rain or after prolonged periods of strong winds. Some downstream winds cause cold, deep waters to replace surface waters that have been warmed by the sun.

To develop a forecast, we use our own mathematical model, which takes into account the current change in water temperature, historical data and the main weather trends, wind strength and direction, air temperature in each specific region. We also take into account data for other resorts in Russia.

Tyumen, Russia | © Anatoly Mankuta

Annual graph of average water temperature change in Bachelino

Water temperature in Bachelino by month

Bachelino located in the northern hemisphere, at latitude 57 degrees. The comfortable water temperature for swimming is set here in July, usually at the beginning of the month. During a year in Bachelino there are 13 days of swimming. In general, the swimming season ends in July. Average annual water temperature on the coast in Bachelino is 8.2°C, by the seasons: in winter 3.0°C, in spring 6.3°C, in summer 16.5°C, in autumn 7.0°C. Minimum water temperature (2.3°C) in Bachelino it happens in October, maximum (23.0°C) in July.

You can find out detailed data on how the water temperature in Bachelino changes in each specific month:

The warmest water today in Russia recorded in Taman, its value is 27.3°C. Lowest - in Pevek, there water temperature now 2.3°C. Average water temperature in the country today - 19.4°C.

Water temperature data in Bachelino and neighboring towns and resorts collected from various sources, using buoys, using satellite maps of sea, river and lake surfaces of the NOAA agency.

We use data from various local authorities in each specific location of the world to more accurately reflect temperature values.

The nearest airport is located in a 68 kilometers. This is Tobolsk (TOX) airport. We have no information as to whether it is valid and what flights it receives or sends.

Find out the temperature of sea water in more than 12000 cities and resorts around the world. Water surface temperature values are available in real time. There is a forecast of water temperature changes for the next few days, as well as historical data of sea surface temperature are available for all days of the last years.

We use data from various sources, including National Centers for Environmental Information (NOAA), meteorological services of different countries, data received from more than a thousand buoys around the world, satellite systems for scanning the surface of the oceans and seas.
